step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job keeping your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow a little straighter and your wrist less bent to feel the full resistance.
Excellent! You're making a good fist while inhaling. Focus on keeping that arm extended overhead and your wrist straight as you tighten your muscles.
Great job opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Remember to keep your arm extended overhead and visualize the fluid moving.
Fantastic! You're effectively opening your hand and relaxing. Continue to keep your arm overhead and your wrist straight during this phase.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with the overhead pumping exercise! Keep your arm straight overhead and focus on making a tight fist as you breathe in. Then, open your hand wide as you breathe out.
